content.text: Match ends, Girona 0, Almería 1.
Second Half ends, Girona 0, Almería 1.
Attempt saved. Javier Acuña (Girona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Substitution, Almería. Pablo Pallarés replaces Leonardo Ulloa.
Corona (Almería) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Dangerous play by Jandro (Girona).
Attempt missed. Leonardo Ulloa (Almería) right footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Henok Goitom with a through ball following a fast break.
Attempt missed. Leonardo Ulloa (Almería) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the left.
Substitution, Almería. Hernán Bernardello replaces Aleix Vidal.
Attempt missed. Luso (Girona) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Óscar Díaz with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Girona. Conceded by Esteban.
Attempt saved. Luso (Girona) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Baltasar Rigo with a cross.
Hand ball by Corona (Almería).
Substitution, Girona. Óscar Díaz replaces José Luis Acciari.
Goal!  Girona 0, Almería 1. Juanma Ortiz (Almería) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Rafita.
